title: BRIEF-Adcorp Says CEO Innocent Dutiro Resigned
text:
BRIEF-Adcorp Says CEO Innocent Dutiro Resigned

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 08:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Adcorp Says CEO Innocent Dutiro Resigned Oct 9 (Reuters) - Adcorp Holdings Ltd : * RESIGNATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER * INNOCENT DUTIRO HAS RESIGNED AS CEO OF ADCORP, EFFECTIVE 8 OCTOBER 2019 * CHERYL-JANE KUJENGA, COMPANY'S CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER WILL SERVE AS INTERIM CEO * ACTIVELY RESPONDING TO POOR TRADING STATEMENT RECENTLY RELEASED BY GROUP * CORRECTIVE MEASURES INCLUDE IMMEDIATE SEARCH FOR A CEO THAT WILL ASSIST GROUP WITH ITS NEXT CHAPTER * CORRECTIVE MEASURES INCLUDE REVIEW OF GROUP'S STRATEGY, REVIEW OF CURRENT GROUP INITIATIVES

BRIEF-Adcorp Says CEO Innocent Dutiro Resigned
description: BRIEF-Adcorp Says CEO Innocent Dutiro Resigned
